name: Edge (itch)
description:
Made over a few days for a short project alongside my Studio 2 students. The brief asked students to choose an artwork at the Queensland Gallery of Modern Art and, over a week, adapt that artwork in some way into a videogame experience.

My own game ended up being more of an inspired-by than an adaptation of Anish Kapoor's Untitled 2006-07. I was interested in that work's exploration of edges and concepts of inside and outside, and that lead to this work.

I wrote more about what I was trying to do with it here.

(In 2017 I am challenging myself to make 50 little videogames to get more familiar with the tools. I make no guarantee that any of the games are good, but that's not really the point. This is game #8 or 50.)
